With this application you can easily create the weekly planning of all the meals you want for the day (breakfast, lunch, dinner...). To do this you will have to create the recipes of your favorite meals adding all the information you want (ingredients, category, steps, cooking time...), and assign them to the meals of the day and of the week. You can also create the shopping list automatically.

HOW IS IT USED:
- Create the weekly menu by pressing the '+' button and selecting the schedules you want for the day (you can create new schedules and reorder them).
- Click on the '+' button on the schedule and select the recipes you want to assign to that schedule.
- You can copy menus from one week to another, or from one day to another.
- You can add or remove schedules any day of the week.
- Create your recipes, add the name, cooking time, category, ingredients, instructions, a photo, and even extra notes and a star rating.
- You can see a new recipe of the day every day, and save it in your application or share it in PDF or Text with whoever you want.
- Add the category of the recipe to later be able to filter recipes by category, or by name.
- Add ingredients to the recipe from the ingredients list of the application, you can add the amount of the ingredient needed for the recipe.
- Add the necessary instructions to prepare the recipe.
- Select a photo for the recipe, you can choose it from your gallery or take it with the camera directly.
- Create an empty shopping list and add ingredients by selecting from the ingredients list.
- Create a shopping list by selecting the weekly menu, and it will be created automatically with the ingredients of the recipes for that week.
- Create a shopping list by selecting the recipes and it will be created automatically with the ingredients of the recipes.
- Mark purchased ingredients by tapping on them, or remove them by swiping left.
- You can share your weekly menus, your recipes, or your shopping lists with whoever you want, in PDF or Text format.
- Print your weekly menus to have them visible in your kitchen.

WHY USE THIS APP?
- Save time by having the week's meals planned from the start, without having to think about what to do or what to buy for the rest of the week.
- Spend less money on the purchase since you will have the week's food prepared and the shopping list made automatically to buy only what is necessary.
- Do not waste food, since you will only have what is necessary for the week in the fridge.
- Healthier life knowing that you will have to eat every day and be able to prepare it when you can, without having to improvise or buy fast food.
- Completely free application, you only have to pay if you want to remove advertising or help the developer to improve the application.
- Available for Apple Watch and with a very useful Widget.

FEATURES:
- Create the weekly menu with the daily meals you want.
- Create the schedules you want for the day.
- See the planned meals of the week or the whole month, and the most used dishes of the month.
- Create all the recipes you want and assign them to the meals of the week.
- Filter recipes by category or by name.
- Create shopping lists and add the ingredients you want.
- Create automatic shopping lists from selected recipes, or weekly menu planning.
- Add ingredients to the list of ingredients in the application.
- Share recipes, menus, or shopping lists in PDF or text with your contacts.

- Use the Apple Watch application to see your weekly menu and your shopping lists whenever you want and quickly.

Cellar 2 is the new and improved way to manage your wine collection. It's not just a bland list of names and vintages - it looks and feels like a proper cellar! Browsing your wine collection is like looking at the real thing.

Try it out with our free trial, and then purchase the full version from within the application. After the free trial period finishes, if you choose not to purchase the full version, then Cellar 2 will switch to read-only mode.

Customize each bottle based on:

• shape of bottle - including the Bocksbeutel!
• color of glass - enjoy new custom colors!

Add information about each one, such as:

• Wine Producer

• Grape (including blends)

• Type

• Personal notes

• Personal star rating

Locations
--------
Cellar 2 is more than just a Cellar. It's a Garage, Wishlist and Trash as well! Finished a bottle? Move it to the Garage for future reference if you enjoyed it. Didn't like it? Move it to the Trash, where you can locate it later if required. What about wine that you've been recommended or tasted in a restaurant? Enter it straight into your Wishlist and then move it to the Cellar when you eventually purchase it.

List mode
----------
If you want to see your wines in a more conventional list, you can easily do so by tapping the list option in the menus.

Search and Sort
-------------
You can search for wine based on any of the data you've entered, as well as sort your entire collection based on: Type, Region, Vintage, Price or Rating. Search and Sort are available in both cellar and list modes too!

Backup/Restore/Merge
----------------------
Worried about losing all that info you've entered? You can now share your backups using native iOS sharing facilities, and the same popular merge option is available to avoid duplicating bottles between devices.

Sharing individual bottles
-------------------------
Don't just email your bottles to your friends - share them! You share the bottle itself and not just some info about it. Your friends receive a link that they can either import into their own copy of Cellar 2 or review on a webpage. If they import it, the whole bottle is downloaded into their Cellar, shape, glass color, label image, notes and all!

Porque te conocemos, queremos ayudarte. En La Frutería trabajamos para  entregar lo más fresco para promover que las familias coman de verdad.

Nos mueve ver a los hijos de nuestros clientes, los pequeños del hogar, que descubren su nueva fruta preferida, desde ellos se puede ver el cambio para tener a familias con mejor alimentación y vidas más saludables.

This weekly food planner is a handy tool for both small and large families to manage their weekly menu calendar and meal plan, if you're on a diet (e.g. keto, whole30, forkes over knives, mediterranean diet ...) or not. You can even use it as a diabetic meal planner.

The meal planner
- Swipe to go to next or previous week

Other

My girlfriend and I have been doing meal planning for some time now. We were looking for and app but we didn't find one that did fulfill our needs. My girlfriend and I have already been using it for a while and now I would like to share it with the world and hopefully help many families in their food planning.

Who should use this app
It doesn't matter if try to lose weight or if you follow the keto, paleo, whole30, forkes over knives, fodmap, herbalife, atkins or vegan diet.
